name: An assassin's cowl
data: It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It increases the users hitpoints pathetically.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'master tumbler'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'tumble'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
